attributes.action: Stop Parliament debating a 2nd EU in/out referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Leave got over 1.3 million more votes than Remain!
3.8% difference in votes.
Remain camp trying to move the goalposts as they didn't like the result.
attributes.background: I want to stop Parliament wasting their valuable time in debating putting a threshold on percentage minimums for the result to be taken seriously. The U.K. have spoken. The result is in.
